entry.title: Increasing fee defaults to 5000+500 for a healthier network?
entry.summary: In this brief conversation, Pierre responds to Rusty in an agreeable manner. It is unclear what Rusty's initial message was, but Pierre's response indicates that he finds Rusty's suggestion or proposal reasonable. The use of the word "cheers" suggests a friendly and casual tone between the two parties. Overall, this is a short and straightforward exchange with no significant details beyond the affirmation of agreement.
